value:
$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Taaake...THIS!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|GAH! Leonie! What was that for?
That water's freezing!$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|It's only freezing because you're
not in it yet. Maybe you'd be warmer
if you weren't staying in the shade!$k$pGet out here and dive in already!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, I'd...rather not get a sunburn.
We're just the type who prefer to
relax on vacation.$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Yes, gazing out over the waves
is more than enough for me...$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|That's such a waste! What's the
point of coming to the beach if you
aren't going to enjoy any of it?!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Well, everyone's different, aren't
they? Have you considered maybe
you're the one wasting their trip?$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|What?! I— I just wanted to splash
around and have fun in the water
with everyone...$k$p...Whatever. Let's go swimming,
Mercedes. C'mon!$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Oh... Er, Leonie? Would you please
slow down? ...You don't need to
walk quite so fast!$k$p$WmMPID_マリアンヌ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Hrmm... She seems upset... Are you
sure that was the right thing for us
to do, Hilda?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|What do you mean? It's not MY fault
she's upset!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Whew! What a swim! The sea water
feels great, doesn't it?$k$pThis seems like a good time to take
a breather... Shall we, Mercedes?$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Yes, let's... Oh, look! There's a stall
over there selling frozen treats.
Shall we go get some?$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Oooh, nice! Yes! ...They have flavors
I've never even heard of before!$k$pHmm... Right. I'll have some of that
yellow flavor and, um... Let's see...$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Hee hee! Are you going to buy some
for Hilda and Marianne too?$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Yeah... I probably should...$k$pI've been thinking about how I was
being stubborn about nothing earlier.$k$pI should apologize for saying their
vacation preferences were a waste...
Especially since it's THEIR vacation.$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|I think that's a wonderful idea.$k$pBut the two of us might have some
difficulty carrying treats for all four
people... What should we do?$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Oh, hey! Leonie! Mercedes! I didn't
know you'd be here too! ...Are you
doing anything fun?$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Caspar! Perfect timing!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|My fingers are freezing! How did
I get roped into carrying all this
frozen stuff anyway?!$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|No time to talk! We have to run
back to Hilda and Marianne! If we
don't hurry, these treats'll melt!$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Hee hee... Thank you so much for
all your help, Caspar.$k$p$Sbs150|
